title: 3-PACK PTO Power Take Off Pins Yoke Quick Release S.27804 | ohiodieselparts
text: Old style design, common PTO Pin with quick release lock pin. Fits many models of American PTO yokes on various equipment. Yellow-zinc coating If you've used this on something please let us know so we can ad it to our compatibility list. CONTENTS: Three (3) PTO Yoke Pin approximate Overall Length 3-1/2” X 1/2” widest Diameter. 3-PACK PTO Power Take Off Pins Yoke Quick Release S.27804 SKU: PTO-2780403 $27.99Price - This is the old style pin design that everyone uses. 3-PACK. - Quick Release Lock Pin - Hard to find old style power take off pin - Fits most American PTO Yokes on various equipment - Heavy yellow-zinc coating for corrosion resistance
